OK, correct me if I'm wrong, but when the Predacon base moved, it 
was't attacking anything. Also, if the whole base is moved at once, 
the power drain on the systems would not allow the weapons or shields 
on the ship to work. Therefore the base is defenceless as it moves. 
So if it was attacked, it would take on damage. But it wasn't 
attacked, so then no damage to ship was made. If the ship defended 
it'self, then that breaks the rule and should be voided.  Let me know 
about this.

Logo.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@c...> wrote:
> (Mobile base rule would be taken affect here.  That's illegal 
> Kinger.  And before you start complaining about the Alliance Base, 
> notice how it was in five different pieces which were transported 
by 
> shuttle, leaving them all 100% defenseless)
